page.title: 12A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY-WALES
page.content: I wake up at 8:00am and get ready for school.I wash and clean my teeth. I have breakfast:cereals and a cup of tea.After breakfast I go to school on my bike and leave it near school at a friend's house.Before school starts I play marbles with my friends.At 9:00 the bell rings for start of school.At first we may do mathematics or hand writing.At 9:20 we have assembly with a song, prayers and a song.I like them ! Afterwards we do lessons until playtime at 10:35. The boys and girls sometimes play at catch.At 11:00 we go back into school for lessons until dinner time at 12.00.Afternoon lessons begin at 1:15 when we might do English or History until playtime at 2.30. Next we get ready for PE. It's rounders today ! Afterwards we hear a story until 3:45 at home time.
